AssociateApprovedOrigin.name: AssociateApprovedOrigin
AssociateApprovedOrigin.description:
Grants permissions to associate approved origin for an existing Amazon Connect instance.
                                                The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings for the instance.

AssociateBot.name: AssociateBot
AssociateBot.description:
Grants permissions to associate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance.
                                                The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings for the instance.
AssociateBot.dependentActions:
iam:AttachRolePolicy
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   iam:CreateServiceLinkedRole
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   iam:PutRolePolicy
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DeleteResourcePolicy
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DescribeBotAlias
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:GetBot
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:UpdateResourcePolicy

AssociateCustomerProfilesDomain.name: AssociateCustomerProfilesDomain
AssociateCustomerProfilesDomain.description:
Grants permissions to associate a Customer Profiles domain for an existing Amazon
                                                Connect instance. The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings
                                                for the instance.

AssociateInstanceStorageConfig.name: AssociateInstanceStorageConfig
AssociateInstanceStorageConfig.description:
Grants permissions to associate instance storage for an existing Amazon Connect instance.
                                                The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings for the instance.
AssociateInstanceStorageConfig.dependentActions:
ds:DescribeDirectories
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   firehose:DescribeDeliveryStream

                                                   iam:PutRolePolicy
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   kinesis:DescribeStream
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   kms:CreateGrant
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   kms:DescribeKey
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   s3:GetBucketAcl
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   s3:GetBucketLocation

AssociateLambdaFunction.name: AssociateLambdaFunction
AssociateLambdaFunction.description:
Grants permissions to associate a Lambda function for an existing Amazon Connect instance.
                                                The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings for the instance.

AssociateLexBot.name: AssociateLexBot
AssociateLexBot.description:
Grants permissions to associate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance.
                                                The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings for the instance.

AssociateQueueQuickConnects.name: AssociateQueueQuickConnects
AssociateQueueQuickConnects.description: Grants permissions to associate quick connects with a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

AssociateRoutingProfileQueues.name: AssociateRoutingProfileQueues
AssociateRoutingProfileQueues.description:
Grants permissions to associate queues with a routing profile in an Amazon Connect
                                                instance

AssociateSecurityKey.name: AssociateSecurityKey
AssociateSecurityKey.description:
Grants permissions to associate a security key for an existing Amazon Connect instance.
                                                The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings for the instance.

CreateContactFlow.name: CreateContactFlow
CreateContactFlow.description: Grants permissions to create a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

CreateInstance.name: CreateInstance
CreateInstance.description:
Grants permissions to create a new Amazon Connect instance. The associated required
                                                actions grant permissions to configure instance settings.
CreateInstance.dependentActions:
ds:AuthorizeApplication
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ds:CheckAlias
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ds:CreateAlias
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ds:CreateDirectory
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ds:CreateIdentityPoolDirectory
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ds:DeleteDirectory
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ds:DescribeDirectories
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ds:UnauthorizeApplication
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   iam:AttachRolePolicy
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   iam:CreateServiceLinkedRole
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   iam:PutRolePolicy

CreateIntegrationAssociation.name: CreateIntegrationAssociation
CreateIntegrationAssociation.description:
Grants permissions to create an AppIntegration association with an Amazon Connect
                                                instance

CreateQueue.name: CreateQueue
CreateQueue.description: Grants permissions to create a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

CreateQuickConnect.name: CreateQuickConnect
CreateQuickConnect.description: Grants permission to create a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

CreateRoutingProfile.name: CreateRoutingProfile
CreateRoutingProfile.description: Grants permission to create a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

CreateUseCase.name: CreateUseCase
CreateUseCase.description: Grants permissions to create a use case for an AppIntegration association

CreateUser.name: CreateUser
CreateUser.description: Grants permission to create a user for the specified Amazon Connect instance

CreateUserHierarchyGroup.name: CreateUserHierarchyGroup
CreateUserHierarchyGroup.description: Grants permissions to create a user hierarchy group in an Amazon Connect instance

DeleteInstance.name: DeleteInstance
DeleteInstance.description:
Grants permissions to delete an Amazon Connect instance. When you remove an instance,
                                                the link to an existing AWS directory is also removed.

DeleteIntegrationAssociation.name: DeleteIntegrationAssociation
DeleteIntegrationAssociation.description:
Grants permissions to delete an AppIntegration association from an Amazon Connect
                                                instance. The association must not have any use cases associated with it.

DeleteQuickConnect.name: DeleteQuickConnect
DeleteQuickConnect.description: Grants permissions to delete a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

DeleteUseCase.name: DeleteUseCase
DeleteUseCase.description: Grants permissions to delete a use case from an AppIntegration association

DeleteUser.name: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.description: Grants permissions to delete a user in an Amazon Connect instance

DeleteUserHierarchyGroup.name: DeleteUserHierarchyGroup
DeleteUserHierarchyGroup.description: Grants permissions to delete a user hierarchy group in an Amazon Connect instance

DescribeContactFlow.name: DescribeContactFlow
DescribeContactFlow.description: Grants permissions to describe a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

DescribeHoursOfOperation.name: DescribeHoursOfOperation
DescribeHoursOfOperation.description: Grants permissions to describe hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

DescribeInstance.name: DescribeInstance
DescribeInstance.description:
Grants permissions to view details of an Amazon Connect instance. This is required
                                                to create an instance.

DescribeInstanceAttribute.name: DescribeInstanceAttribute
DescribeInstanceAttribute.description: Grants permissions to view the attribute details of an existing Amazon Connect instance

DescribeInstanceStorageConfig.name: DescribeInstanceStorageConfig
DescribeInstanceStorageConfig.description:
Grants permissions to view the instance storage configuration for an existing Amazon
                                                Connect instance

DescribeQueue.name: DescribeQueue
DescribeQueue.description: Grants permissions to describe a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

DescribeQuickConnect.name: DescribeQuickConnect
DescribeQuickConnect.description: Grants permissions to describe a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

DescribeRoutingProfile.name: DescribeRoutingProfile
DescribeRoutingProfile.description: Grants permissions to describe a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

DescribeUser.name: DescribeUser
DescribeUser.description: Grants permissions to describe a user in an Amazon Connect instance

DescribeUserHierarchyGroup.name: DescribeUserHierarchyGroup
DescribeUserHierarchyGroup.description: Grants permissions to describe a hierarchy group for an Amazon Connect instance

DescribeUserHierarchyStructure.name: DescribeUserHierarchyStructure
DescribeUserHierarchyStructure.description: Grants permissions to describe the hierarchy structure for an Amazon Connect instance

DisassociateApprovedOrigin.name: DisassociateApprovedOrigin
DisassociateApprovedOrigin.description:
Grants permissions to disassociate approved origin for an existing Amazon Connect
                                                instance. The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings
                                                for the instance.

DisassociateBot.name: DisassociateBot
DisassociateBot.description:
Grants permissions to disassociate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance.
                                                The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings for the instance.

DisassociateCustomerProfilesDomain.name: DisassociateCustomerProfilesDomain
DisassociateCustomerProfilesDomain.description:
Grants permissions to disassociate a Customer Profiles domain for an existing Amazon
                                                Connect instance. The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings
                                                for the instance.

DisassociateInstanceStorageConfig.name: DisassociateInstanceStorageConfig
DisassociateInstanceStorageConfig.description:
Grants permissions to disassociate instance storage for an existing Amazon Connect
                                                instance. The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings
                                                for the instance.

DisassociateLambdaFunction.name: DisassociateLambdaFunction
DisassociateLambdaFunction.description:
Grants permissions to disassociate a Lambda function for an existing Amazon Connect
                                                instance. The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings
                                                for the instance.

DisassociateLexBot.name: DisassociateLexBot
DisassociateLexBot.description:
Grants permissions to disassociate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance.
                                                The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings for the instance.

DisassociateQueueQuickConnects.name: DisassociateQueueQuickConnects
DisassociateQueueQuickConnects.description:
Grants permissions to disassociate quick connects from a queue in an Amazon Connect
                                                instance

DisassociateRoutingProfileQueues.name: DisassociateRoutingProfileQueues
DisassociateRoutingProfileQueues.description:
Grants permissions to disassociate queues from a routing profile in an Amazon Connect
                                                instance

DisassociateSecurityKey.name: DisassociateSecurityKey
DisassociateSecurityKey.description:
Grants permissions to disassociate the security key for an existing Amazon Connect
                                                instance. The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings
                                                for the instance.

GetContactAttributes.name: GetContactAttributes
GetContactAttributes.description: Grants permissions to retrieve the contact attributes for the specified contact

GetCurrentMetricData.name: GetCurrentMetricData
GetCurrentMetricData.description:
Grants permissions to retrieve current metric data for the queues in an Amazon Connect
                                                instance

GetFederationToken.name: GetFederationToken
GetFederationToken.description:
Grants permissions to federate into an Amazon Connect instance when using SAML-based
                                                authentication for identity management

GetFederationTokens.name: GetFederationTokens
GetFederationTokens.description:
Grants permissions to federate into an Amazon Connect instance (Log in for emergency
                                                access functionality in the Amazon Connect console)

GetMetricData.name: GetMetricData
GetMetricData.description:
Grants permissions to retrieve historical metric data for queues in an Amazon Connect
                                                instance

ListApprovedOrigins.name: ListApprovedOrigins
ListApprovedOrigins.description: Grants permissions to view approved origins of an existing Amazon Connect instance

ListBots.name: ListBots
ListBots.description: Grants permissions to view the Lex bots of an existing Amazon Connect instance

ListContactFlows.description: Grants permissions to list contact flow resources in an Amazon Connect instance

ListHoursOfOperations.name: ListHoursOfOperations
ListHoursOfOperations.description: Grants permissions to list hours of operation resources in an Amazon Connect instance

ListInstanceAttributes.description: Grants permissions to view the attributes of an existing Amazon Connect instance

ListLexBots.name: ListLexBots
ListLexBots.description: Grants permissions to view the Lex bots of an existing Amazon Connect instance

ListPhoneNumbers.name: ListPhoneNumbers
ListPhoneNumbers.description: Grants permissions to list phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance

ListPrompts.name: ListPrompts
ListPrompts.description: Grants permissions to list prompt resources in an Amazon Connect instance

ListQueueQuickConnects.name: ListQueueQuickConnects
ListQueueQuickConnects.description:
Grants permissions to list quick connect resources in a queue in an Amazon Connect
                                                instance

ListQueues.name: ListQueues
ListQueues.description: Grants permissions to list queue resources in an Amazon Connect instance

ListQuickConnects.name: ListQuickConnects
ListQuickConnects.description: Grants permissions to list quick connect resources in an Amazon Connect instance

ListRealtimeContactAnalysisSegments.name: ListRealtimeContactAnalysisSegments
ListRealtimeContactAnalysisSegments.description: Grants permission to list the analysis segments for a real-time analysis session

ListRoutingProfileQueues.name: ListRoutingProfileQueues

Grants permissions to list queue resources in a routing profile in an Amazon Connect

ListSecurityProfiles.description: Grants permissions to list security profile resources in an Amazon Connect instance

ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permissions to list tags for an Amazon Connect resource

ListUseCases.name: ListUseCases
ListUseCases.description: Grants permissions to list the use cases of an AppIntegration association

ListUserHierarchyGroups.name: ListUserHierarchyGroups
ListUserHierarchyGroups.description: Grants permissions to list the hierarchy group resources in an Amazon Connect instance

ListUsers.name: ListUsers
ListUsers.description: Grants permissions to list user resources in an Amazon Connect instance

ResumeContactRecording.name: ResumeContactRecording
ResumeContactRecording.description: Grants permissions to resume recording for the specified contact

StartChatContact.name: StartChatContact
StartChatContact.description: Grants permissions to initiate a chat using the Amazon Connect API

StartContactRecording.name: StartContactRecording
StartContactRecording.description: Grants permissions to start recording for the specified contact

StartOutboundVoiceContact.name: StartOutboundVoiceContact
StartOutboundVoiceContact.description: Grants permissions to initiate outbound calls using the Amazon Connect API

StartTaskContact.name: StartTaskContact
StartTaskContact.description: Grants permissions to initiate a task using the Amazon Connect API

StopContact.name: StopContact
StopContact.description:
Grants permissions to stop contacts that were initiated using the Amazon Connect API.
                                                If you use this operation on an active contact the contact ends, even if the agent
                                                is active on a call with a customer.

StopContactRecording.name: StopContactRecording
StopContactRecording.description: Grants permissions to stop recording for the specified contact

SuspendContactRecording.name: SuspendContactRecording
SuspendContactRecording.description: Grants permissions to suspend recording for the specified contact

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permissions to tag an Amazon Connect resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permissions to untag an Amazon Connect resource

UpdateContactAttributes.name: UpdateContactAttributes
UpdateContactAttributes.description:
Grants permissions to create or update the contact attributes associated with the
                                                specified contact

UpdateContactFlowContent.name: UpdateContactFlowContent
UpdateContactFlowContent.description: Grants permissions to update contact flow content in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateContactFlowName.name: UpdateContactFlowName
UpdateContactFlowName.description:
Grants permissions to update the name and description of a contact flow in an Amazon
                                                Connect instance

UpdateInstanceAttribute.name: UpdateInstanceAttribute
UpdateInstanceAttribute.description:
Grants permissions to update the attribute for an existing Amazon Connect instance.
                                                The associated required actions grant permission to modify the settings for the instance.

UpdateInstanceStorageConfig.description:
Grants permissions to update the storage configuration for an existing Amazon Connect

                                                for the instance.

Grants permissions to update the concurrency in a routing profile in an Amazon Connect
